ManualBlockRule: Enter the maximum bad requests per minute, per IP. Default: 50
Select Yes to create a new S3 bucket for CloudFront Access Logs. Select No if you already have an S3 bucket for CloudFront Access logs.
Enter duration (in minutes) the IP should be blocked for. Default: 4 hours (240 minutes)
